docs.snippet: ALBANY, Monday, April 15. On the meeting of the House this morning, the bill to authorize the embodying and equipment of volunteer militia, to provide for the public defence, was taken up for consideration.
docs.lead_paragraph: ALBANY, Monday, April 15. On the meeting of the House this morning, the bill to authorize the embodying and equipment of volunteer militia, to provide for the public defence, was taken up for consideration.

docs.snippet: ALBANY, Monday, April 15. The Senate met this morning with apparently a new leave of life, and went briskly at work.
docs.lead_paragraph: ALBANY, Monday, April 15. The Senate met this morning with apparently a new leave of life, and went briskly at work.

docs.lead_paragraph: With a view to test as fully as possible the state of public sentiment in the City, our reporters yesterday visited the various places where merchants, business men and politicians respectively congregate, to hear their remarks touching the all-engrossing subject of the hour.
